dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2112 IH: To give the force and effect of law to the Executive Order issued on March 6, 2025 entitled “Establishment of the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and United States Digital Asset Stockpile”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Donalds introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To give the force and effect of law to the Executive Order issued on March 6, 2025 entitled Establishment of the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and United States Digital Asset Stockpile.

section.header: Establishment of the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and United States Digital Asset Stockpile
section.text: The Executive order issued on March 6, 2025 entitled Establishment of the Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and United States Digital Asset Stockpile shall have the force and effect on law.
